data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Caquetá, Colombia that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Caquetá, Colombia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Caquetá, Colombia to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Caquetá words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Caquetá, Colombia.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Passe people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please give the church in the state of Caquetá prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Caquetá, Colombia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 44,052 believers in Caquetá, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

location.name: Caquetá
location.cities_list: Florencia, El Doncello, Puerto Rico, Curillo, El Paujíl
location.cities_list_w_pop: Florencia (130,337), El Doncello (13,082), Puerto Rico (12,306), Curillo (9,539), El Paujíl (7,618)
